content.detail:
I participated as a software engineer in the migration of the avatar.com site from its former platform to the proprietary CMS that my team works with. As a web developer, I contributed to the site's style theming (specific to the Avatar brand) and I also built new features that aided with this migration in addition to benefiting other websites that live on the same CMS platform.

In particular, I contributed a lot of work to support the creation of the "Our Team" section of the site, which features a landing page introducing site guests to the team, with each member having their own bio page. An example of the work I supported included the configurability of having separate top-aligned and bottom-aligned background images for each page, regardless of the varying amounts of content across each team member's information.

images.alt: Webpage of various Avatar-related content, including news articles and featured games.
Webpage focused on the team that works on the Avatar movies, mentioning each member by name.
